      This method displays the last n players in the table (in reverse order).

      This method displays a sorted table, according to the option parsed through.

      Re-draws the Table on the first tab by erasing the model and writing personArray to it again

      This is an overloaded method to display the first N players in the table

      This is an overloaded method to display players between a starting and ending index in the table.

      This method returns the value at [row,col] in the populated table model.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void processCvCchart(int option)
      This method processes the chart for the "Country vs Country" player stats, in the "Multi Player Stats" tab.
      void resetOverallAverages()
      This method resets the overall average statistics (for the table data on the Multiple Player Stats tab).
